section.p: The template is used to record data collected about tissue concentrations of anylytes( usually study drugs and/or their metabolites) as a function of time after dosing the study drug.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:727)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:728)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:729)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics result. [SDTM: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID], [SEND: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:730), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pharmacokinetics Concentration Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1543)
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PCTESTCD, PCTEST], [SEND: PCTESTCD, PCTEST].

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:732), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1544)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PCSTAT], [SEND: PCSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD (CONF:733)
The pharmacokinetics result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU], [SEND: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:734), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:735)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: PCMETHOD], [SEND: PCMETHOD]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:736)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:737)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:738)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:739)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:740)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:741)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:742)
Records the lower limit of quantitation for an assay.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assay Quantitation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:743)
Used to record the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:744)
Captures the planned study day for making an observation or recording a finding.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.68)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:745)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:746)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:747), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:748)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). [SDTM: PCDRVFL]. [SEND: PCBLFL, PCDRVFL, PCEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:749)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:750)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:751)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:752)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:727)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:728)

SHALL contain [1..3] id (CONF:729)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics result. [SDTM: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID], [SEND: PCSEQ, PCREFID, PCSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:730), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pharmacokinetics Concentration Finding Set locally defined STATIC (CONF:1543)
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PCTESTCD, PCTEST], [SEND: PCTESTCD, PCTEST].

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:732), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1544)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PCSTAT], [SEND: PCSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with data type CD (CONF:733)
The pharmacokinetics result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU], [SEND: PCORRES, PCORRESU, PCSTRESC, PCSTRESN, PCSTRESU]

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:747), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:748)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). [SDTM: PCDRVFL]. [SEND: PCBLFL, PCDRVFL, PCEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:734), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:735)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: PCMETHOD], [SEND: PCMETHOD]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:736)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:737)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:738)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:739)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:740)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:741)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:742)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assay Quantitation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.16)
Records the lower limit of quantitation for an assay.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:743)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)
Used to record the organization performing the test.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:744)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Study Day (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.68)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:745)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:746)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:749)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:750)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:751)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
